text: For the purposes of this part, the term "practice of cosmetology" means providing or offering to the general public for a fee any of the following services solely for cosmetic purposes:   bleaching, braiding, coloring, curling, cutting, dressing, eyebrow arching, the use of devices or chemicals to straighten, curl, or wave hair, shampooing, singeing, styling, weaving, or similar work performed upon the face, hair, hairpiece, or wig of a person; electrolysis;  esthetics;  and manicuring.  The practice of cosmetology shall not include shaving or trimming the beard or moustache of a person.
